speaker: doctor
text: Let me measure the child's growth parameters today. I'm going to measure body length and head circumference.

speaker: doctor
text: But I don't want the generation of a Vitals command.

speaker: doctor
text: The child's body length is 28 inches.

speaker: doctor
text: And the head circumference measures 45 centimeters.

speaker: doctor
text: These measurements are tracking well on the growth chart for the child's age.
